ONLY FOR TESTING PURPOSES
get_average_price_on_leg(flight_uid)¶

This is computed using only the price paid by passengers without connection if possible. If there is none, use the number of legs as weight.

get_reactionary_buffer(flight_uid)¶

Cancelled flights will not be considered, as they should be absent from the aircraft queue.

get_tat(airport_uid, flight_uid)¶

Returns a typical turnaround time based on the type of aircraft of flight_uid

get_total_travelling_time(itinerary)¶

Note: this assumes that the connections are feasible. Note: it uses the most up to date information.

register_agent(agent)¶

Should not be used in theory….

register_airline(aoc)¶

Do that after the aoc registered all its flights

register_network_manager(nm)¶

ONLY FOR TESTING PURPOSES
